revised_title: Electric Researches of Cavendish and the Sheffield Meeting
tldr: This article presents a list of transactions from a meeting held at Sheffield in 1879. It includes the Electric Researches of Cavendish, edited by J. Clerk Maxwell, and a report on the bronze medal struck for the Fourth Centenary of the University of Copenhagen. The article also features a portrait of the Rev. M. J. Berkeley, F.R.S., issued with the "Gardeners' Chronicle."
